# Course Overview {.unnumbered}

This is the complete set of _course materials_ for the _Quantitative Genetics Graduate Education Module (GEM)_ at the University of Oregon for the Spring of 2023. It is written in **Markdown** so that it can be easily updated.

In this book you will find nearly all the information you will need to complete the course.

```{r include=FALSE}
# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'
), 'packages.bib')
```
